user_reaction: I would prefer a 3 star rating, price range isnt important.
error_text: What price range and what star rating are you looking for ?
context: <user> I'm looking for a train that goes to Cambridge and arrives by 08:45. <system> I found 231 trains that fit your request. Where will you be departing from? <user> I will be departing from Birmingham New Street on Tuesday. <system> TR0254 Leaves at 05:40, would you like me to book that for you? <user> No thank you. Please tell me about the ticket pricing and time of travel <system> The price is 75.10 pounds and it is a 163 minutes ride. Can I help you with anything else? <user> Please book 6 tickets and send me the reference number. <system> Booking was successful, the total fee is 450.6GBP payable at the station . Reference number is : G368B2VI. Can I help with anything else today? <user> Yes please. I need a 3 star hotel that offers free wifi <system> I found two expensive hotels, one in the centre and one in the south of town. Do you have a preference?<user> I would like to stay in the centre of town please. <system>
